ValidationRule.description: Ensures the discaharge summary is entered when a case is marked 'Closed Awaiting Admin' or 'Discharged'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(TEXT(Status) = 'Closed Awaiting Admin', TEXT(Status) = 'Discharged'), ISBLANK(Discharge_Summary__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must complete a discharge summary when closing the case
